name: reflect
human_readable_description: Service to capture and store telemetry data related to process activities and reflect on the data to analyze process performance and predict outcomes.

intentions: When I want to analyze the behavior of processes over time
Which may include using data from $requirements
Then I want to capture detailed telemetry data on process updates
And I want to use $connectors to integrate this data with analysis tools
use_case_prompts: The user wants to capture telemetry data for a specific process
The user queries telemetry data to analyze process performance
The user uses telemetry data to predict process outcomes
The user monitors real-time data for active processes
